welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Knightdale, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. Get ready to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for major airlines such as JetBlue, Southwest, and Air Canada.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Franklin Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Franklin Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
